args: from requests_html import HTMLSession; session = HTMLSession(); r = session.get('https://example.com'); print('Title:', r.html.find('title', first=True).text); print('Links:', len(r.html.absolute_links)); print('HTML length:', len(r.text))

expected_output.example:
Title: Example Domain
Links: 1
HTML length: 1200+

HTML fetched and parsed

args: from requests_html import HTMLSession; session = HTMLSession(); r = session.get('https://example.com'); heading = r.html.find('h1', first=True).text; paragraphs = [p.text for p in r.html.find('p')]; print(f'Heading: {heading}'); print(f'Paragraphs: {len(paragraphs)}')

expected_output.example:
Heading: Example Domain
Paragraphs: 2

Content extracted with CSS selectors

args: from requests_html import HTMLSession; session = HTMLSession(); r = session.get('https://example.com'); links = [(link.text, link.attrs.get('href')) for link in r.html.find('a')]; print('Links found:', len(links)); [print(f'  {text}: {href}') for text, href in links]

expected_output.example:
Links found: 1
  More information...: https://www.iana.org/domains/example

Links extracted with text and URLs
